Ball Aerospace is suspending further development of the COSMOS open source software and will no longer upgrade the platform beyond Version 5. For the time being, if you need technical assistance in support of Version 5 or earlier versions, please contact: ATIS Front Range. Any changes to the support available will be communicated in the future. 6

The User Interface for Command and Control of Embedded Systems

COSMOS 5 has been released!

Full Lifecycle

Use the same interface from test to operations. Test automation, data display, graphs and more.

How COSMOS works →

Open Source

All of the code is open source - no surprises, easy to debug, and fully documented.

View Source →

Support Available

Commercial licenses, support contracts, and complete configuration support available.

Contact Us →

Get up and running in seconds.

(See Full Installation Instructions)

Quick-start Instructions

# On Windows:

C:\>cosmos-control start

# On Linux/Mac:

$./cosmos-control.sh start

# => Now open a browser to localhost:2900
